casebody.data:
No. D-2589. In the Matter of Discipline of Steven Boyd Alderman. 564 U.S. 1016, 131 S. Ct. 3052,

180 L. Ed. 2d 869,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4584. June 20, 2011.

Steven Boyd Alderman, of Syracuse, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
